pr_title: Add Libp2p Noise security protocol support

timeline.message: Bump libp2p to the noise fixed version
Add Noise support to network configuration

timeline.bodyText: By adding Noise above Secio, do we preferentially use Noise now?
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText:
Yes. When initiating connection we would try to negotiate noise first
No more preferences besides this. secio would also be supported in both initiator and responder roles
replies.author: Nashatyrev
